channel.description: Recent content in competitions on R. Miles McCain

item.title: Hackathons
item.description: I love hackathons, whether it’s as a participant or—as of recently—a judge. It’s hard to replicate the thrill of building. HackNEHS 1st place (Fall 2017): won first place in HackNEHS, a ‘hackathon’ for New England high schools. Blueprint (@ MIT) 2nd place (Winter 2018): won second place in Blueprint, a national annual hackathon hosted at the MIT Media Lab. Hack Exeter (Spring 2019): won the Developer’s Award at Hack Exeter, a hackathon hosted at Phillips Exeter Academy.
